headline: Philip Morris International (PM) Outperformed in 2025 as Smoke-Free Growth Accelerates
summary: Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE:PM) is one of the Best Dividend Stocks of 2025. Philip Morris International Inc. (NYSE:PM) was always closely linked to cigarettes. However, in 2016, the company shifted its focus toward creating a smoke-free future, initiating a transformation within both its business and the broader tobacco industry. Since then, efforts have been […]
